individual.insert_query: INSERT INTO individual_query(id, SSN, additional_params) VALUES($1, $2, $3) RETURNING *

regional.insert_query: INSERT INTO regional_query(id, region, additional_params) VALUES($1, $2, $3) RETURNING *

radius.insert_query: INSERT INTO radius_query(id, center_lat, center_long, radius, additional_params) VALUES($1, $2, $3, $4, $5) RETURNING *
